items.text: length ball, just outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: back of a length just outside off, and some extra bounce means Taylor has to fend this from near his face
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on off, slower from Saifuddin. Taylor keeps his eyes on the ball till the last moment, and defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, but the bounce is lower this time. Plays the late cut to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and Nicholls is in two minds there. Thought he was shaping up to pull, but checks his shot eventually. Punched to mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball angling across, and cut away from his body to deep point for a walking single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: chance of a run out! But nope, and that's New Zealand's 100. Full ball on middle, that he can't steer away behind square. Ball rolls away to the leg side as the batsmen call for the single. Saifuddin runs towards the ball, dives forward and releases the ball early... but it's not a direct hit
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and blocked with the bat's open face to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he backs away to make some extra room. Hammers the drive past mid off's right to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and the ball dips in this time. Driven with the straight bat to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on leg, and Nicholls makes room again. Splices a drive to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: yorked! Lands at the base of leg stump, and he squirts a leg-side whip to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he opens his stance to drive down to long on. Comfortable single
items.postText: Veni-Vidi-Dicti: "@SRK: NZ chased down England's 335 at the University Oval, last March that passed. Just saying."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling into his body, and clipped behind square to deep backward square. Quite comfortably done in the end
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: length ball on middle, and worked off his pads towards fine leg once again. Just the single this time around
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: goes short, but the ball doesn't bounce enough. Angling into Taylor, and he nudges this off his hips to deep backward square. Half-century stand between these two
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: length ball just outside off, and again angling into his body. Rides the bounce to block towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to deep backward square again. They jog the first one hard, and Taylor pushes his partner for the second
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and nicely driven through the off side. Pierces the gap between cover and mid off.... and the ball's racing away to the boundary. Eleven off FIzz's over
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, and he tentatively prods forward. Pushed to cover's right for a quick single
items.postText: James: "Taylor will be the 4th fastest to 8000 runs whether he gets there today or not. He's a true ODI great that probably is a little overlooked because he plays for NZ"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and Taylor stands tall, before punching straight to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball from round the wicket, and it's aimed at middle stump. Nicholls backs away and punches this very straight. Mid-on's sliding effort parries the ball to mid off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and turning inwards. Whipped away to the diving Mortaza at square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and he cuts off the back foot to deep cover. Reaches fifty to a modest applause from the Dunedin crowd
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and worked off the front foot to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run
